title: When do you write and review your goals? - Quora

response.answer_text: Write your goal in chronological order and by “most achievable” and “least achievable” this doesn’t mean they are literally not achievable but it means what is most achievable during the moment. Make sure it is not something like “buy three business” while struggling to pay bills etc. Does this make sense?Make sure they make sense along with something you will actually do and not just writing down a goal to feel fulfilled. When you achieve your goals you should check them off and the goals that are most important should be highlighted in blue.
